mosinstall.name: WidgetBucks Module
mosinstall.author: Information Madness
mosinstall.description:
Recently launched WidgetBucks, a Pay Per Click Program that claims to have a high CTR than AdSense. Publishers can register and can get approved without any problem.

The site recently launched a CPM program for international publishers as well. So if you get US traffic, you will get Paid per Click but if you have Traffic outside USA, you will be paid for the impressions.

This widget will place PPC ads based on your site niche. You can select your category or leave it upto their crawlers to find out the keywords for your site.

Check out the WidgetBucks for more details & video Demo. Register yourself at WidgetBucks, get your WidgetBucks container id from the code script/ads.js?uid= and enter it in this module. Make sure you only enter the value of uid

param.name: containerID
param.label: WidgetBucks Container ID
param.description: Find this Container ID within the WidgetBucks Code.
